CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Samsara Inc provides an end-to-end solution for operations: The solution connects physical operations data to the Connected Operations Cloud, which consists of the Data Platform and Application. Geographically, it derives a majority of revenue from the United States.
